Ensure the article content paragraph text is justified with font family 'Georgia' and line height 1.6
Verify the 'Share' button has aria-label 'Share article', background color #17a2b8, and border radius 4px
Verify on the 'Dashboard' page, the 'New Order' button is visible, has background color #28a745, font size 16px, and padding 10px 15px
Check the 'Recent Activity' section title has text 'Activity Log' with font weight 600 and color #343a40
Ensure the activity list count is 5 items
Verify the scrollable container has scroll-top at 0px initially, and a width of 100%
Confirm the avatar image of the latest activity has rendered dimensions 30x30px and is loaded
Load 'https://example.com/product/details'
Verify the 'Product Name' text is 'Wireless Headphones', with font size 28px, font weight 700, and color #1f1f1f
Check the SKU value is 'WHX-101' and its font size is 14px
Confirm the 'Add to Cart' button has background color #ff6f00, text color #ffffff, border radius 6px, and width 200px
Verify the product rating displays 4.5 stars and the count of reviews is '250+'
Confirm the image gallery thumbnails transition their border color over 200ms on hover
Access the 'File Upload' component
Verify the 'Choose File' button has background color #007bff, color #ffffff, width 120px, and height 36px
Check the file input field has placeholder 'No file chosen'
Ensure the 'Upload' button is initially disabled and has opacity 0.6
Verify the 'Max file size: 10MB' label is visible and has font size 12px
Confirm the progress bar is hidden until a file is selected
Check the component has border 1px dashed #cccccc
Open the 'Settings' panel
Verify the 'Account' tab is active, indicated by background color #e0e0e0 and 3px solid left border in #007bff
Check its text color is #333333
Confirm the 'Profile Picture' upload area has width 150px and height 150px
Ensure the 'Display Name' input field has value 'Test User' and border bottom 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the 'Save' button is enabled and has padding 10px 20px
Confirm the 'Cancel' button has text 'Cancel' and color #6c757d
Navigate to the 'Promotions' page
Verify each promotion banner (count: 3) has height 200px and background image source 'promo_bg.jpg'
Check the 'Shop Now' button on the first banner has background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font weight 600, border radius 5px, and is positioned at bottom: 20px, right: 30px
Ensure the banner title text is 'Limited Time Offer' with font size 22px and opacity 0.9
Verify the banner has a transition on hover for background color over 400ms
Verify on the 'Event Details' page, the event title text is 'Tech Conference 2024' with font size 36px, font weight 900, color #000000, and top margin 40px
Check the event date text is 'October 26, 2024' with font size 18px and font family 'Roboto'
Ensure the 'Register Now' button has background color #fd7e14, text color #ffffff, padding 15px 30px, border radius 8px, and is visible
Confirm the event description text alignment is 'justify'
Load the 'Documentation' page
Verify the navigation sidebar is visible, has width 250px, and background color #f8f9fa
Check the 'Getting Started' link is active with background color #e9ecef, font weight 700, and color #0056b3
Ensure the search input field has placeholder 'Search documentation' and border 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the main content area has left margin 270px
Confirm the 'Print' button has aria-label 'Print page' and opacity 0.8
Access the 'Image Editor'
Verify the canvas area has width 800px, height 600px, and border 1px solid #cccccc
Check the 'Undo' button is disabled with opacity 0.5
Confirm the 'Crop' tool button is active, indicated by background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Ensure the 'Zoom' slider has current value 75% and its color changes upon interaction
Verify the 'Download' button has aria-label 'Download image' and is enabled
Confirm the edited image has watermark 'Draft' with opacity 0.3
